snippet: In the months before Pakistan jets began pounding Taliban hideouts in the lawless border region near Afghanistan, militants were busily conducting an unprecedented wave of kidnapping and extortion, stockpiling cash for the fight ahead....

headline.print_headline: Crime Spree Helps Pakistani Taliban Squirrel Away Cash Before Raids Begin
headline.main: Crime Spree Helps Pakistani Taliban Squirrel Away Cash Before Raids Begin

lead_paragraph: In the months before Pakistan jets began pounding Taliban hideouts in the lawless border region near Afghanistan, militants were busily conducting an unprecedented wave of kidnapping and extortion, stockpiling cash for the fight ahead.
